title: Lemon Fudge with Sweetened Condensed Milk

Ingredients.2: 1 (11.25 ounce) can sweetened condensed coconut milk

Ingredients.3: 1 (3 ounce) package sugar-free lemon pudding mix

Ingredients.4: 2 cups erythritol confectioners' sweetener (such as Swerve®)

Directions.1: Line a small rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper or greased aluminum foil.

Directions.2: Combine butter, condensed coconut milk, and lemon pudding mix in a heavy saucepan over medium heat. Cook, stirring continuously, until mixture has thickened, about 10 minutes. Remove from heat.

Directions.3: Beat in sweetener and lemon extract. Pour mixture onto the lined baking sheet and spread it out to an 1/4-inch thickness.

Directions.4: Refrigerate until fudge is set, about 1 hour. Lift fudge out of the baking sheet using the parchment paper and cut into 1-inch squares. Serve chilled.
